pages.text: Extracts of the $(l:resources:blood_orchid)Blood Orchid$(/l) have an ingense effect, when consumed: they may to put you into $(thing)Frenzy$().$(br)damage, attack speed, knockback resistance are buffed the more you kill. But if you do not regularly score a kill you get negative ones.
It's active ingredients can be extracted from a petal into a thick solution. While it almost smells like Rose Water, it's effect when drunk is definitely... $(italic)a little more effervescent$().
The $(thing)Frenzy$() effect you may get is starts out low, but lasts a bit longer.
The $(thing)Frenzy$() effect you may get is relatively short, but starts out quite high.
